message: Let's make a deal! I think this is a fair starting point, but open to hearing your thoughts.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, given that we both get a smaller share with each passing round. Let's try to come to an agreement quickly.
Bob, time is running out and we both lose if we can't agree. I'm coming down a little bit, but I need you to meet me closer to the middle.
